suprathermal-ions.alt: Figure showing suprathermal ion spectral index
suprathermal-ions.caption: A plot of the suprathermal ion spectral index ($gamma$) versus the ratio of the alpha particle to proton densities ($n_alpha/n_p$). The dashed line indicates the expected value for injection from the solar wind peak. The solid line shows the best fit to the data points, which are color-coded by normalized radial distance ($R/odot$). From Alterman et al. (2020), ApJ, 903, 122. © AAS. Reproduced with permission under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 licence.
